About ProxyEthica Network

What is ProxyEthica?

ProxyEthica Network is a privacy-focused, ethical proxy service designed to protect your online identity while respecting ethical boundaries. Unlike traditional proxy services, ProxyEthica is built on principles of transparency, user control, and responsible internet usage.

Our mission is to provide secure access to the internet while maintaining high ethical standards in how we handle data and privacy.

Our Ethical Principles

Transparency

We are completely open about how our proxy service works, what data is collected, and how it's used. No hidden trackers or secret data collection.

User Control

You maintain full control over your proxy connection. Set your own limits, decide when to connect, and choose your privacy settings.

Responsible Usage

Our proxy service is designed for legitimate privacy needs and secure browsing, not for circumventing ethical guidelines or legal requirements.

Data Minimization

We collect only the minimum data needed to provide the service and maintain quality. Your browsing history and personal data are never logged or sold.

Frequently Asked Questions

How is ProxyEthica different from other proxy services?
ProxyEthica is built with ethical principles at its core. We focus on transparency, user control, and responsible usage, unlike many proxy services that prioritize anonymity at any cost.
Is my browsing data logged or monitored?
No. We do not log, store, or monitor your browsing history or content. We only collect minimal technical data needed to maintain service quality.
Can I use ProxyEthica to access geo-restricted content?
Yes, ProxyEthica allows you to access content that may be restricted in your geographic location, but we encourage users to respect the terms of service of the content providers.
How do I get started with ProxyEthica?
Simply use the extension popup to configure and connect to a proxy server. You can add custom servers or use our recommended options for better privacy.
